cd:Record.name: GOME2_PCD_SMR
cd:Record.cd:Description: Product Confidence Data record for SMR spectrum

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of Sun calibration mode spectra which pass the intensity check
Flag indicating that the number of Sun calibration mode spectra passing the intensity check was too low

cd:Array.cd:Description: Flag indicating that no SMR was generated due to missing Sun calibration mode measurements, per channel
